statements: SELECT * FROM WaterUsageRestrictions
SELECT id, location, restriction_level FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE end_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, location FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE government_id = 1 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, location, start_date, end_date FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE restriction_level = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE location = 'California' AND restriction_level > 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, start_date FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' AND government_id = 10;
SELECT location, restriction_level FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE restriction_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY location ASC, restriction_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE government_id IN (5, 8, 12) AND location LIKE '%New%' ORDER BY location ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_restrictions FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM water_restrictions;
SELECT location_id, start_date, end_date FROM water_restrictions;
SELECT id, location_id, restriction_type FROM water_restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'mandatory';
SELECT * FROM water_usage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, usage_amount FROM water_usage WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_restrictions WHERE restriction_type='Outdoor Watering'
SELECT location_id, start_date FROM water_restrictions WHERE end_date>'2022-01-01'
SELECT id, date, usage_amount FROM water_usage WHERE location_id=5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM water_restrictions WHERE start_date<='2022-05-31' AND restriction_type='Public Parks' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT id, location_id, date, usage_amount FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM local_governments;
SELECT name, location FROM local_governments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT government_id, usage_amount, date_recorded FROM water_usage WHERE household_id = 123 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT government_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM water_usage GROUP BY government_id;
SELECT * FROM water_restrictions WHERE start_date >= '2021-10-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM local_governments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM local_governments WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE usage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT w.id, w.usage_amount, wr.restriction_level FROM water_usage w JOIN water_restrictions wr ON w.government_id = wr.government_id;
SELECT l.name AS government, SUM(w.usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM local_governments l JOIN water_usage w ON l.id = w.government_id GROUP BY l.name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterAuthorities;
SELECT authority_name, region FROM WaterAuthorities;
SELECT user_name, user_type FROM WaterUsers;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE usage_amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, usage_date, usage_amount FROM WaterUsers JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterUsers.user_id = WaterUsage.user_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterAuthorities
SELECT user_name, user_type, authority_name FROM WaterUsers JOIN WaterAuthorities ON WaterUsers.authority_id = WaterAuthorities.authority_id
SELECT user_name, usage_date, usage_amount FROM WaterUsers JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterUsers.user_id = WaterUsage.user_id
SELECT * FROM WaterRestrictions WHERE restriction_level >= 2 ORDER BY restriction_level DESC
SELECT authority_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM WaterUsers JOIN WaterAuthorities ON WaterUsers.authority_id = WaterAuthorities.authority_id GROUP BY authority_name
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption
SELECT location, consumption_amount FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT restriction_type, start_date, end_date FROM WaterRestrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'Outdoor watering'
SELECT violation_type, location, fine_amount FROM Violations WHERE is_resolved = FALSE
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM Inspectors
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption
SELECT consumer_id, consumption_amount FROM WaterConsumption WHERE location = 'City A'
SELECT * FROM WaterRestrictions ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT violation_type, location, fine_amount FROM Violations WHERE is_resolved = FALSE
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM Inspectors
